#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 10000007
int dp[7][100000];

int decode(int i,int &run,int &ball,int &wic) {
    
    if(i == 0) {
        run = 0;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 1) {
        run = 1;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 2) {
        run = 2;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 3) {
        run = 3;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 4) {
        run = 4;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 5) {
        run = 6;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 6) {
        run = 1;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 7) {
        run = 2;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 8) {
        run = 3;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 9) {
        run = 5;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 10) {
        run = 1;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 11) {
        run = 2;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 12) {
        run = 5;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 13) {
        run = 7;
        ball = 0;
        wic = 0;
    }
    else if(i == 14) {
        run = 0;
        ball = 1;
        wic = 1;
    }
}

int calc(int balls, int runs) {
    if(balls > 6 || runs <= 0)
        return 1;
    
    if(dp[balls][runs])
        return dp[balls][runs];
    long long ans = 0;
    
    int run,ball,wic;
    for(int i=0 ;i<=14;i++)
    {
        decode(i,run,ball,wic);
        
        if(wic)
            ans = (ans+1) % MAX;
        
        ans += calc(balls+ball,runs-run);
        ans %= MAX;
    }
    
    dp[balls][runs] = ans;
    
    return ans;
}

int main() {
    int t;
    int run;
    
    cin >> t;
    
    for(int i=1;i<=t;i++) {
        cin >> run;
        cout << "Case " << i << ": ";
        cout << calc(1,run);
        cout << endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
